txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Flawed ears from beasts in the central and eastern Lone-lands. Bring the ears to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth.
'Our warriors will be given these when they have proven their strength.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Strength comes from within, and a sign of that strength can bolster a man like little else. Would you get ears from the beasts in the central and eastern Lone-lands as symbols for my people?'
Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth desires flawed ears from the beasts found throughout the central and eastern Lone-lands.
Deliver the flawed ears to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth
You accepted a task from Frideric the Elder to acquire flawed ears from the beasts in the central and eastern Lone-lands. You can find Frideric the Elder within Ost Guruth.
Wanted: Flawed ears from beasts in the central and eastern Lone-lands.
